pullrequest.title: Properly mark internal CMake cache variables as advanced

content.raw:
A user in one of our internal projects complained that, since switching to Gazebo9 from Gazebo8, the `ccmake` interface was full of unrelated and confusing variables. 

Apparently, the problem was due to a few CMake cache libraries that are used in the ign-cmake find scripts, but that were not properly marked as advanced.
